extendedInfo.description: A simple but addictive game where two players take turns crossing out circles and try to force their opponent into crossing out the last circle. There are 15 circles arranged in a triangle to start the game, and during each player's turn they must cross out at least one circle by drawing a line through it, but lines may not intersect and they must be straight, so it takes a lot of strategy to be victorious.*Now with no ads!*Features:Single Player Mode versus the computerThree Levels of difficultyTwo Player Mode so you can play against your friendsStatistics screen so you can view your lifetime record against the computer

reviews.comment: This is a really fun game, make sure to check it out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t be bothered. Connect four much better.
reviews.author: A Google User
